T02TD1913E:154a-1: shr'i sa ha dza sa m'a dza s'a dha n'a ma /
T02TD1913E:154a-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD1913E:154a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1913E:154a-5: dri med ye shes gzi 'od ldan //
T02TD1913E:154a-7: dpag med sprul pas 'gro skyob pa //
T02TD1913E:154a-9: yid 'ong ri bo'i drung sogs su //
T02TD1913E:154a-10: blo ldan zhugs te yid dad pas //
T02TD1913E:154a-11: gdong sogs dag byas bsod nams bsags //
T02TD1913E:154a-12: de rjes chos kun stong par bsam /
T02TD1913E:154a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a a'atma ko& ham //
T02TD1913E:154a-14: rdo rje'i gzhi la rab dkar dge / chos 'byung dbus su padma dang //
T02TD1913E:154a-15: nyi ma la gnas sna tshogs mdog / rdo rje las byung 'khor lo bsam //
T02TD1913E:154a-16: gru bzhi zur bzhi sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1913E:154a-17: sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis spras //
T02TD1913E:154a-18: ba dan dril bus khyab pa ni //
T02TD1913E:154a-19: kun nas nyams dga'i po brang bsam //
T02TD1913E:154a-20: de dbus dbyangs yig rnal bzlog las //
T02TD1913E:154a-21: zla rgyas grub ste de steng 'dir //
T02TD1913E:154a-22: gsal byed rnal bzlog dbyangs yig bcas //
T02TD1913E:154a-23: 'phros bsdus las byung h'um yig blta //
T02TD1913E:154a-24: mtha' yas sprul pas don bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1913E:154b-0: rgyal ba mthing ga rab mdzes @154b sgeg //
T02TD1913E:154b-1: g-yas g-yon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1913E:154b-4: ral gri 'bar ba g-yas g-yon phyag / skyil krung rnam par rol pas bzhugs //
T02TD1913E:154b-5: nam mkha'i mdog ltar rab dangs bsgom //
T02TD1913E:154b-6: aom dang a'a:dang de bzhin du //
T02TD1913E:154b-7: h'um zhes byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //
T02TD1913E:154b-9: ye shes bkug la dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1913E:154b-10: de nas thabs chen shes rab mchog / bde chen dad du snyoms zhugs pas //
T02TD1913E:154b-11: mi 'gyur thig ler rnam par zhu //
T02TD1913E:154b-12: spyan sogs glu yis sad par bya //
T02TD1913E:154b-13: aom dharm'a dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1913E:154b-14: rang snyid zla ba h'um dang ni //
T02TD1913E:154b-15: mgrin par padma la gnas a'a: //
T02TD1913E:154b-16: spyi bor 'khor lo aom gyis mtshan //
T02TD1913E:154b-17: thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD1913E:154b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02TD1913E:154b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1913E:154b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1913E:154b-21: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi//
T02TD1913E:154b-22: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1913E:154b-23: deng bdag byin gyis brlab mdzad nas //
T02TD1913E:154b-24: rdo rje'i thugs gsung skur mdzad nas /
T02TD1913E:154b-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1913E:154b-26: shes rab dam pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1913E:154b-27: thabs bcas 'byung ba rang bzhin lus //
T02TD1913E:154b-28: dga' bzhis bde gshegs mnyes bya zhes //
T02TD1913E:154b-29: sngags pas dga' ba kun du brtsam /
T02TD1913E:154b-30: aom a'a:badzra dhri ka h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1913E:154b-31: aom a'a:badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri mum h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1913E:154b-32: h'um gi rdo rje las byung ba //
T02TD1913E:154b-33: yid tshul dam pa'i chu skyes la //
T02TD1913E:154b-34: gnas pa'i sngags phreng phyung nas ni //
T02TD1913E:154b-35: rtse gcig yid kyis bzla bar bya //
T02TD1913E:154b-36: kun rtogs mtshan ma kun las grol //
T02TD1913E:154b-37: yang dag rigs las tha mi dang //
T02TD1913E:154b-38: zhi sogs las kun sgrub byed rgyu //
T02TD1913E:154b-39: snying rje can gyis mi 'grub med //
T02TD1913E:154b-40: dpal ldan gsang chen lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1913E:154b-41: bsnyen pas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1913E:154b-42: mdor bsdus rim pa'i 'di brjod pas //
T02TD1913E:154b-43: skye bos sangs rgyas lnga 'grub shog / gsang chen lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje sgeg pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1913E:154b-45: // / kha che'i rigs kyi pandi ta chen po buddha shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02TD1913E:154b-46: lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
